pullrequest.title: Fix scale issue in copy and paste

content.raw:
The patch works for me on Gazebo now but I got a segfault running UNIT_Visual_TEST:


```
#!c++
Program received signal SIGABRT, Aborted.
0x00007ffff0eae267 in __GI_raise (sig=sig@entry=6)
    at ../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/raise.c:55
55	../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/raise.c: No such file or directory.
(gdb) bt
#0  0x00007ffff0eae267 in __GI_raise (sig=sig@entry=6)
    at ../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/raise.c:55
#1  0x00007ffff0eafeca in __GI_abort () at abort.c:89
#2  0x00007ffff0ea703d in __assert_fail_base (
    fmt=0x7ffff1009028 "%s%s%s:%u: %s%sAssertion `%s' failed.\n%n", 
    assertion=assertion@entry=0x7ffff5940b58 "!inScale.isNaN() && \"Invalid vector supplied as parameter\"", 
    file=file@entry=0x7ffff5940ad8 "/build/buildd/ogre-1.9-1.9.0+dfsg1/OgreMain/src/OgreNode.cpp", line=line@entry=630, 
    function=function@entry=0x7ffff5941140 "virtual void Ogre::Node::setScale(const Ogre::Vector3&)") at assert.c:92
#3  0x00007ffff0ea70f2 in __GI___assert_fail (
    assertion=0x7ffff5940b58 "!inScale.isNaN() && \"Invalid vector supplied as parameter\"", 
    file=0x7ffff5940ad8 "/build/buildd/ogre-1.9-1.9.0+dfsg1/OgreMain/src/OgreNode.cpp", line=630, 
    function=0x7ffff5941140 "virtual void Ogre::Node::setScale(const Ogre::Vector3&)") at assert.c:101
#4  0x00007ffff5631f9f in Ogre::Node::setScale(Ogre::Vector3 const&) ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOgreMain.so.1.9.0
#5  0x00007ffff491f84c in gazebo::rendering::Visual::SetScale (this=0xc01b90, 
    _scale=...)
    at /home/caguero/workspace/gazebo/gazebo/rendering/Visual.cc:746
#6  0x00007ffff493aef9 in gazebo::rendering::Visual::UpdateFromMsg (
    this=0xc01b90, _msg=...)
    at /home/caguero/workspace/gazebo/gazebo/rendering/Visual.cc:2391
#7  0x000000000045f2f9 in Visual_TEST_UpdateMeshFromMsg_Test::TestBody (
    this=0xba9650)
    at /home/caguero/workspace/gazebo/gazebo/rendering/Visual_TEST.cc:784
#8  0x000000000059919c in testing::internal::HandleSehExceptionsInMethodIfSupported<testing::Test, void> (object=0xba9650, 
    method=&virtual testing::Test::TestBody(), 
    location=0x5c2f63 "the test body")
    at /home/caguero/workspace/gazebo/test/gtest/src/gtest.cc:2079
#9  0x000000000058e88d in testing::internal::HandleExceptionsInMethodIfSupported<testing::Test, void> (object=0xba9650, 
    method=&virtual testing::Test::TestBody(), 
---Type <return> to continue, or q <return> to quit---
    location=0x5c2f63 "the test body")
    at /home/caguero/workspace/gazebo/test/gtest/src/gtest.cc:2115
#10 0x00000000005538d2 in testing::Test::Run (this=0xba9650)
    at /home/caguero/workspace/gazebo/test/gtest/src/gtest.cc:2152
#11 0x0000000000554b64 in testing::TestInfo::Run (this=0x9cbb80)
    at /home/caguero/workspace/gazebo/test/gtest/src/gtest.cc:2327
#12 0x0000000000555839 in testing::TestCase::Run (this=0x9cae40)
    at /home/caguero/workspace/gazebo/test/gtest/src/gtest.cc:2445
#13 0x0000000000565485 in testing::internal::UnitTestImpl::RunAllTests (
    this=0x9cab40)
    at /home/caguero/workspace/gazebo/test/gtest/src/gtest.cc:4316
#14 0x000000000059afd6 in testing::internal::HandleSehExceptionsInMethodIfSupported<testing::internal::UnitTestImpl, bool> (object=0x9cab40, 
    method=(bool (testing::internal::UnitTestImpl::*)(testing::internal::UnitTestImpl * const)) 0x564f0e <testing::internal::UnitTestImpl::RunAllTests()>, 
    location=0x5c37b8 "auxiliary test code (environments or event listeners)")
    at /home/caguero/workspace/gazebo/test/gtest/src/gtest.cc:2079
#15 0x00000000005907d3 in testing::internal::HandleExceptionsInMethodIfSupported<testing::internal::UnitTestImpl, bool> (object=0x9cab40, 
    method=(bool (testing::internal::UnitTestImpl::*)(testing::internal::UnitTestImpl * const)) 0x564f0e <testing::internal::UnitTestImpl::RunAllTests()>, 
    location=0x5c37b8 "auxiliary test code (environments or event listeners)")
    at /home/caguero/workspace/gazebo/test/gtest/src/gtest.cc:2115
#16 0x00000000005629a6 in testing::UnitTest::Run (
    this=0x8ca280 <testing::UnitTest::GetInstance()::instance>)
    at /home/caguero/workspace/gazebo/test/gtest/src/gtest.cc:3930
#17 0x00000000004a1817 in RUN_ALL_TESTS ()
    at /home/caguero/workspace/gazebo/test/gtest/include/gtest/gtest.h:2288
#18 0x000000000049bcea in main (argc=1, argv=0x7fffffffda18)
    at /home/caguero/workspace/gazebo/gazebo/rendering/Visual_TEST.cc:1293
```
